technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Soft tissue region demonstrates hypoechoic without fluid collection.
Uterus appears mildly thickened; endometrial thickness measures 38.41 mm.
Major vessels show isoechoic waveform on Doppler.
Prostate is well-defined; volume approximately 30.68 cc.
impression: Appearance concerning for possible malignancy—correlate clinically.
recommendations: MRI or CT correlation may be helpful.
